nodes.text: The MaKing-class transport was a space transport built by General Spacetronics.

Built by General Spacetronics, the MaKing-class were armed transports. Some models of the vessel were built by local interests under license, such as "Janako" model, which was distinguishable by the unique flanges at the vessel's rear.

Roark Garnet was able to identify a modified Janako model MaKing-class transport by its flanges, and determined that modifications had been made around its gunports which would have upgraded the vessel's firepower.
